constraints.name: sorted_front_increasing
constraints.description: 前部值必须按递增顺序排列

constraints.name: sorted_back_decreasing
constraints.description: 后部值必须按递减顺序排列

constraints.name: unique_values
constraints.description: 所有卡片上的数字在1到2n之间且每个数字恰好出现一次

constraints.name: flip_operation
constraints.description: 可以翻转任意子集的卡片，使得前部和后部值互换

constraints.name: rearrange_order
constraints.description: 翻转后可以重新排列卡片的顺序
